title: Vote in the Ravens RISE High School Football Showdown poll
text:
Sports High School Sports Vote in the Ravens RISE High School Football Showdown poll 
The Baltimore Ravens are teaming up with the Baltimore Sun to present the Ravens RISE High School Football Showdown for the 2015 season! 
Each week of the high school football regular season, fans will vote for an area high school football matchup to be featured by the Ravens and the Baltimore Sun. The selected game each week, which will be covered by the Sun, will receive visits from the Ravens mascot, Poe, and Baltimore Ravens Cheerleaders* and have their stadium outfitted in Ravens banners and flags. In addition, $500 donations will be awarded to each participating schoolâ€™s athletic department, with each team receiving T-shirts to commemorate their experience playing in the Ravens RISE High School Football Showdown. Poll closes at 7 p.m. on the Tuesday before the game. 
*Ravens entertainment is subject to change based on availability. 
PAST GAMES 
Week 1, Sept. 4: Dundalk 45, Kenwood 6 | Game story | Photos 
Week 2, Sept. 11: Oakdale 42, Westminster 10 | Game story | Photos 
Week 3, Sept. 18: Catonsville 44, Dulaney 13 | Game story | Photos 
Week 4, Sept. 25: Perry Hall 53, Parkville 12 | Game story | Photos 
Week 5, Oct. 2: Fallston 14, C. Milton Wright 0 | Game story | Photos 
Week 6, Oct. 9 and 12: John Carroll 41, Boys' Latin 22 | Game story | Photos | Video
